querySet.query: from[{{setCode}}-tokens-and-checklist]
from[*]?getMarketingCardsForSet({{setCode}})

querySet._comment: Early sets had 1/67 cards as foil, equating to 15/67 (~20%) chance a booster had a foil, and as of TSP it replaces a common.
querySet.query: from[ori-foils]?rarity=rarityByWeight2008(curm)
from[ori-seeded-white]?rarity='r'
from[ori-main]?title='Gideon, Battle-Forged (Kytheon, Hero of Akros)'
